Dear Hagop,

 

Thank you for your time today. To summarize the discussion,  below are the points we kindly request you to please furnish and complete:

 

1.	MCT FZE- Jewelers Block – NGI

 

1.	KYC Form to be completed
2.	Shareholder Certificate or MOA or AOA of MCT FZE
3.	Renewed Trade License of Chalhoub Group Limited

 



 

4.	TL of Major Share holder of  MICHEL CHALHOUB TRADING CO.L.L.C.(Orient Beauty International FZCO )

 

2.	MCT FZE- Cyber- QIC

1.	E-KYC form to e submitted- attached link
2.	To confirm ADDRESS as P.O Box 18060 Jebel Ali Dubai  United Arab Emirates

 

3.	MARSH KYC

1.	Attached KYC form.

 

Please let us know if you have any questions, happy to discuss.

 

Best Regards,

Hannah Gabo
